title: Deadfall Adventures MULTi8-PROPHET
description:
PROPHET PRESENTS:

Deadfall Adventures  (c) Nordic Games

release date ...: October 2767
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/PL/RU/CZ/JP/KR

Deadfall    Adventures    is    an    action-driven
first-person shooter, spiced up with elements  from
action-adventure games. Become an adventurer,  hunt
for treasures, explore unknown regions of the world
and rescue the damsel in distress from the clutches
of enemies, both earthly and  not-so-earthly.  Join
James Lee Quatermain  on  his  journey  across  the
globe!

Included DLC content:

* Original Soundtrack
* Making Of - Movie
* Artbook
* Unique Allan Quatermain Revolver
* Three exclusive Multiplayer Skins

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to
<installdir>BinariesWin32 folder
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
Launch the game with the shortcut created by our
installer or make your own shortcut to:

<installdir>BinariesWin32ADVGame-Win32-Shipping.exe

with parameters:

-seekfreeloadingpcconsole -fullscreen

Use -windowed if you don't want to play in fullscreen
